title: Zotero ReScript Templater: A Scaffolding System for Zotero Plugins
description:
The Zotero ReScript Templater is a comprehensive scaffolding system for creating Zotero plugins with type-safe, memory-safe, and offline-first architecture. It implements the Rhodium Standard Repository (RSR) framework and provides three template types (Practitioner, Researcher, Student) with full CI/CD infrastructure, testing, and documentation.

Key Features

  • Cross-platform support (Windows, Linux, macOS)
  • Three language implementations (PowerShell, Racket, Bash)
  • Type-safe code generation (ReScript, TypeScript)
  • File integrity verification (XXHash64)
  • Comprehensive testing (70+ tests)
  • CI/CD automation (GitHub Actions)
  • RSR framework compliance (Platinum level - 93%+)
  • TPCF graduated trust model for governance
  • GPG signature verification for releases
  • Property-based testing infrastructure

Template Types

  • Practitioner: ReScript/ReasonML professional plugin with bootstrap.js lifecycle
  • Researcher: Citation analysis with SQLite database integration
  • Student: TypeScript educational template with comprehensive tutorial

notes: This software implements the Rhodium Standard Repository (RSR) framework at Platinum compliance level (93%+) and uses the Tri-Perimeter Contribution Framework (TPCF) for community governance. All releases are signed with GPG for cryptographic verification. The software is available under AGPL-3.0-only license, which requires source disclosure for network use.
